title: [Feat]: Custom background for teams-for-linux
body:
### Describe the feature

Possibility to add custom image as a background on teams call

### Motivation

I would like to set a custom background image (e.g., a .png file) that I downloaded from Google Images. I want to use this feature to change my background wallpaper during chat calls, matching the image to the theme of the conversation.

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

maybe is there any other possibility to load custom images for example using the terminal and modifying the config etc? if so please provide me steps :)


afaik there is a windows edition that supports choosing the images
